main event: A military aircraft observed an unidentified flying object near Lewiston, Maine for 4-5 hours.
interesting points: The object was described as circular, small, and changing colors between red, white, and green.
The object exhibited erratic movement and flashing lights, and remained in the sky with no clear flight path or disappearance.
Both ground and air visual observations were made of the object.
The sighting occurred on a clear night with slight haze and some aurora borealis activity.
No photos were taken, and no intercept was made due to the military aircraft's mission.
sighted object: circular, small object changing colors between red, white, and green
witnesses: military aircraft crew, ground personnel at Brunswick NAS, Maine
